Class WriteMutation

  • java.lang.Object

    Mutation

    public class WriteMutation
extends BaseMutation
    Mutation which writes(inserts) object into Cassandra.

        Creates instance of delete mutation operation.

        entry - Ignite cache entry to be inserted into Cassandra.

        ctrl - Persistence controller to use.
